10: Bugfix: Mobile: Show correct start page
Bugfix: Show own friends on own profile
Bugfix: Profile is changeable again, settings work again
Display correct access count for all friends and friends of friends in filter search
9: Setting for sound and message send
8: New mobile menu with more touch-friendly links
Uploading and Changing the profile picture from a mobile device (iPhone and iPad were tested)
Tablets in portait and landscape mode are now supported
Own messages are not unread any more
Time format changed to also include minutes in hour format
7: Show nickname in header search bar
Create circle in circle search, if no results were found
Buttons now give feedback to the user about what they are doing
6: Hotfix: Messages are now marked as unread again
5: Mail for new post and new message
Profile Language can now be saved
4: Profile Image can now be changed
Decryption is now done in a  thread
Posts are regularly fetched from server
Bugfix: Add as Friend works again
3: Tablets use the smartphone version until the tablet responsive is done
Sound and document title management service added.
Messages are only read if window is active
2: Bugfix: After adding a friend you can now directly add him to a circle!
Improve key loading. Load multiple keys at once.
Bugfix: Relationship and Work now removes unnecessary words
URLs in messages are automatically linked!
1: Profile Images: Use blob urls if possible
